response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and value, it's worth more than $100 to many of our customers. Considering its worth to you, I'd like to propose a special offer: you can purchase the product for $110. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire something truly valuable at a price that's still quite competitive. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your response.", "product_price": 110}
